title.rendered: Elementary Schools Band and Orchestra Registration Information

content.rendered:
We are fortunate and excited to be able to offer fourth and fifth-grade students, the opportunity to participate in band and/or orchestra!

For program information and instrument rental information, please fill out the Registration for Fall Registration Form.  To learn more visit the instrumental music website.

We have also sent information home via hard copy and email through your child’s building.

We encourage you to discuss this opportunity with your child(ren) and to consider participating in band or orchestra. We look forward to making music with your student!

Contact Information for the Instrumental Music Team:

Caroline Street:

  • Band- Mr. Quiñones: b_quinones@saratogaschools.org
  • Orchestra- Ms. McNamara: m_mcnamara@saratogaschools.org

Division Street:

  • Band- Mrs. Ferrie-Healy: m_ferrie@saratogaschools.org
  • Orchestra- Mrs. Vincent: b_vincent@saratogaschools.org

Dorothy Nolan:

  • Band- Ms. Lamb: k_lamb@saratogaschools.org
  • Orchestra- Ms. McNamara: m_mcnamara@saratogaschools.org

Geyser Road:

  • Band- Ms. Lamb: k_lamb@saratogaschools.org
  • Orchestra- Mrs. Vincent: b_vincent@saratogaschools.org

Greenfield:

  • Band – Ms. Lamb: k_lamb@saratogaschools.org
  • Orchestra- Mr. Bull: d_bull@saratogaschools.org
  • Orchestra- Ms. McNamara: m_mcnamara@saratogaschools.org

Lake Avenue:

  • Band- Ms. Lamb: k_lamb@saratogaschools.org Orchestra
  • Mrs. Vincent: b_vincent@saratogaschools.org

Art & Music K-5 Department Head: Mr. Bull: d_bull@saratogaschools.org
